name: Jack The Reaper (arlagames)
description:
Collect the souls and avoid the angels and holy relics. 

Collect the fresh (spinning) souls in the right order to maximise your score.

Fresh soul = 2x score and 2x multiplier segments.

  • 20 fresh souls = 10,000 bonus
  • 21 fresh souls = 20,000 bonus
  • 22 fresh souls = 30,000 bonus
  • 23 fresh souls = 50,000 bonus
